blocks-media--theme.title: Always know how much you spent and on what
blocks-media--theme.description: Yandex Cloud prices are suitable for both major companies with high-load services and small projects with modest requirements. Pay only for the resources you use or commit to a certain volume for 1 or 3 years and save up to 49%. Track your expenses right in the management console.

blocks-media--default.title: Always know how much you spent and on what
blocks-media--default.description: Yandex Cloud is a public cloud platform that provides corporations, medium businesses, and individual developers with a scalable infrastructure, data storage services, and ML and development tools. Using these technologies proven by time and Yandex's experience, everyone can develop and continuously improve their own cutting-edge digital services and apps.
blocks-media--default.additionalInfo: Yandex Cloud was launched in 2018 and has doubled in size since then. Both in total revenue and in terms of its customer base: more than 10 thousand companies now use our services every day.

blocks-media--video.title: Watch webinar
blocks-media--video.description: Learn how to implement an architecture for processing big data based on Yandex Cloud managed services.
